pageProduct.name: Oil Garden Lemongrass Essential Oil 25ml
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

This oil is revitalising, releasing and foucsing.

Also useful for: Muscular aches, pains, cramps, spasms and digestion

A potent sharp refreshing citrus scent with a slightly herbaceous earthy undertone

Warnings

STORE BELOW 30C. NOT TO BE TAKEN ORALLY. KEEP OUT OF REACH OF CHILDREN.

Ingredients

Cymbopogon schoenanthus leaf 1mL/mL

Directions

Adult: For the relief of MUSCULAR ACHES, PAINS, CRAMPS and SPASMS: add 5 drops to 10mL base oil and massage onto affected area. Assists the digestive system and aids DIGESTION: add as above and massage onto stomach area in a clockwise direction. If symptoms persist consult your healthcare practitioner.
